about_the_game:
This DLC contains 25 new songs, as well as additional map and heroine content.

New Features

This DLC allows the following songs to become playable:
  • A Proud Flight
  • Scream out!
  • Against, Perfect Cherry Blossom.
  • SAMURAI GHOST GIRL, KILL! KILL!
  • Faraway
  • Divine Spirit Mausoleum Autumn Festival!
  • Shoutoku’s Legend
  • Never Come Undone
  • King of the Sekkyo
  • Rainy, rainy days
  • LOVE EAST
  • Spiritual Domination ~ Who done it!
  • Pandora
  • Mami Mami Zone
  • Painting The Lips Red
  • DESIREDRIVE
  • Can't Look Away
  • Heavenly Wind
  • Flower Flag
  • Marisa Stole the Precious Thing
  • SWEET BLUE ICE
  • Tiny Little Adiantum
  • Shout It Out Loud!!!
  • Ephemeral, Great and Splendid Land of Grief
  • Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon

New Spot "Senkai"


New Spot "Senkai" is here!
What will Reimu encounter here...?

New Heroine


A new Heroine, "Toyosatomimi no Miko" is playable!
On top of that there will be many more Heroines being added, such as "Letty Whiterock", "Kyouko Kasodani", and more!
  • Yuuka Kazami
  • Letty Whiterock
  • Ran Yakumo
  • Hina Kagiyama
  • Kyouko Kasodani
  • Soga no Tojiko
  • Mononobe no Futo
  • Toyosatomimi no Miko
  • Mamizou Futatsuiwa
  • Shinmyoumaru Sukuna
  • Kasen Ibaraki

short_description: Extra Song Pack 2! Grants access to 25 songs, including Touhou original "Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon" !
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
